languages.text: "Надеюсь, ты не повторишь ошибок предыдущего Мастера дисциплины".
"I hope you will not repeat the mistakes of the previous Master-at-Arms."
languages.original_text: "Надеюсь, ты не повторишь ошибок предыдущего Мастера дисциплины".

traits.locale_text: "I hope you will not repeat the mistakes of the previous Master-at-Arms."
"I hope you will not repeat the mistakes of the previous Master-at-Arms."
"I hope you will not repeat the mistakes of the previous Master-at-Arms."
"I hope you will not repeat the mistakes of the previous Master-at-Arms."
"I hope you will not repeat the mistakes of the previous Master-at-Arms."
"I hope you will not repeat the mistakes of the previous Master-at-Arms."

languages.text: « J'espère que vous ne reproduirez pas les erreurs de votre prédécesseur. »
languages.original_text: "I hope you will not repeat the mistakes of the previous Master-at-Arms."

traits.locale_text: « J'espère que vous ne reproduirez pas les erreurs de votre prédécesseur. »

languages.text: «Espero que no repita los errores del anterior maestro de armas».
languages.original_text: "I hope you will not repeat the mistakes of the previous Master-at-Arms."

traits.locale_text: «Espero que no repita los errores del anterior maestro de armas».

languages.text: “希望你不要重蹈前任戒律大师的覆辙。”
languages.original_text: "I hope you will not repeat the mistakes of the previous Master-at-Arms."

traits.locale_text: “希望你不要重蹈前任戒律大师的覆辙。”

languages.text: 「前任のマスター・アット・アームズの失敗を繰り返さないといいな」
languages.original_text: "I hope you will not repeat the mistakes of the previous Master-at-Arms."

traits.locale_text: 「前任のマスター・アット・アームズの失敗を繰り返さないといいな」

languages.text: "Ich hoffe, Ihr wiederholt nicht die Fehler des letzten Master-at-Arms."
languages.original_text: "I hope you will not repeat the mistakes of the previous Master-at-Arms."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hoffe, Ihr wiederholt nicht die Fehler des letzten Master-at-Arms."

languages.original_text: "I hope you will not repeat the mistakes of the previous Master-at-Arms."
